transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, ma'am boliye ma'am.
Customer: Ji, good evening ma'am. Baba Glass Interior mein baat ho rahi hai meri.
Executive: Haan ji, haan boliye.
Executive: Ji, Reena baat kar rahi hu main IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji, bataiye ma'am.
Executive: Ji, actually main Durgesh ji se ke senior baat kar rahi hu. Durgesh aapka account handle karta hai ma'am. To actually we are trying to connect you from long time. Actually problem ye aa rahi hai aapke.
Customer: Wo positive samjhana chah rahe wo cheez samajhte nahi. Hum unko bole ki aap mera WhatsApp number note down kijiye.
Customer: Aapko jis product mein problem hai, main uska image bhej deti hu. Aur sara jo bhi jo bhi description hai, main koshish karke bhej dungi. Aap update kar do.
Customer: Wo wo cheez samajhte nahi. Wo mujhe hi samjha rahe hai ki aap kar lijiye, ye kar lijiye. Are ma'am, calling mein main apni inquiry deti hu. Updation ke liye isi ke liye na aap log ko rakha gaya hai ki bhai aap log is cheez ko hamara jo profile hai.
Executive: Ma'am, ma'am, ma'am, I I agree, I agree. Lekin yaha pe maine call sirf product updation ke liye nahi kiya hai. I have called you. Maine ye cheeze update karne ke liye call kiya hai ki aapki do category jo star service mein opted hai, Italian marble and green ply plywood. In dono mein last 30 dino se ek bhi buylead nahi purchase hui hai. To ye aapki visibility ko directly hamper kar raha hai. Ab buylead purchase karne ka authority to aapko hai.
Customer: Ye Italian marble aur granite jo hai wo hamare jo floor sector hai na wo handle karte hai. Wo division alag hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Achha ye team alag hai aap ye keh rahe ho?
Customer: Haan haan, wo team alag hai. Plywood ka bhi main plywood bhi samajh lijiye aisa product hai.
Customer: To ye sab customer ko hai ki uske zariye kuch aur agar ho to mujhe. Plywood hum log purchase karte nahi hai. Matlab generally wo aap floor sector se baat kariye ki plywood ka karna kya hai. Plywood aur granite ka, marble aur granite ka.
Executive: Koi nahi, aap ek kaam ye karna, aap ye karna green plywood mein agar aapka koi discussion unse hota hai to aap ye bol dena agar ye product mein aapko deal nahi karna hai to star service category ko change kar de.
Customer: Wo to aap ek baar puch lijiye sir ka bhi number. Primary number hai, primary.
Executive: Achha, main unko call kar lungi. Lekin LED mirror kaun dekhta hai? LED mirror kaun dekhta hai ma'am?
Customer: Wo bhi sir yaha se handle hota hai. Ye aapka Ashok Rastogi wale banate hai.
Executive: Achha, aap kewal wall panel, aap kewal sliding window aur wall panels dekhte ho, right?
Customer: Ji, main UPVC window dekhti hu, theek hai na. Hmm. Theek hai. Aur aap haan, bas maximum contact usi mein rehta hai. Kyunki aur sab product main dekh nahi paati. Lead purchase karne se nahi na mujhe lagega mere liye useful hai.
Executive: Nahi, wo baat correct hai ma'am, wo baat correct hai. Hum basically aapko tabhi inform karte hai.
Customer: Haan, quantity itni kam hai to usme se kya purchase karoge.
Executive: Nahi, agree, agree. Ye ye cheez hum isse agree kar rahe hai. Lekin hum aapko tabhi call karte hai, inform karte hai jab maan lijiye last 30 dino mein aapne ek bhi buylead nahi purchase kiya kisi particular product ka. Tab hum aapko call karte hai. Kyunki we know ma'am ki 30 din mein aisa ho hi nahi sakta hai ki ek single buylead bhi aisi nahi hogi jo aapke product se related hoga. Theek hai? Aur iske alawa bhi agar main baat karu na to aapke yaha do number added hai. Ek to aapka number aur ek sir ka number hai. Lekin jo buyer aapko incoming call kar rahe hai na wo sari call aapki miss ho rahi hai na. 50% se above call aapki miss ho rahi hai har mahine.
Customer: Ma'am, mere paas to call aa rahe hai. Abhi jaise aapka call aaya main isko attend kar rahi hu. 50% pata nahi kaise ho ja raha hai ye SMS se ye nahi aa raha.
Executive: Aisa to nahi hai ki non office, aisa aisa to nahi hai ki 7:00 baje ke baad call aata hoga to ho sakta hai aap us time available nahi rehte hoge office mein. Matlab aapke paas do option hai.
Customer: Phone to mere paas hi rehta hai na. Phone mere paas hi rehta hai. Ab mere phone mein ring aata hi nahi hai. Jabki main non office ke hour mein bhi main apna on kar chuki hu. Theek hai.
Executive: Non office hour mein aap dekhte ho. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan haan, wo to hai hi ma'am. Kyunki ring hoga to pata chalega.
Executive: To ek kaam aap ye karna, ek kaam aap ye karna call dono number pe ek saath jaati hai. Agar primary pe kisi ne call nahi uthaya to wo automatically aapke number pe transfer hoga. To aap ek kaam ye karna ye jo aapka preferred number hai na ye number to aapne save kiya hi hoga jis number se buyer call karta hai aapko.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: 08044946859 ye aapka number hai. Ye number pe aap check kar liya karo ki kitni miss call aapke paas dikha rahi hai daily basis pe.
Customer: Kabhi kabhi ho sakta hai shayad ek do ho jaaye ye matlab ek din mein ek do aapka miss call miss ho jaata hai kabhi hota hai.
Executive: Nahi, wo to hai ma'am. Ek do pe to ek do pe to hum bolte nahi jab pure mahine mein hum ye dekhte hai ki 50% se zyada call miss ho gayi. Jaise is mahine agar main baat karu to zyada call miss nahi hui hai. 17 call aayi thi, chhe call aapki answer thi. Matlab chhe call aapki miss hui hai 17 mein se. Last month kya hua tha 20 call aayi thi aur 20 mein se 15 ke 15 call aapki miss ho gayi thi ma'am.
Customer: Last month tha. Haan. Same cheez September mein hua tha. 48 call aaya tha, 48 mein se 30 call aapki miss ho gayi thi.
Customer: Sir udhar sir ka jab se matlab sir ka tha na. Mera aisa non office hour mein ek baar aur call aaya tha fir jab hum apna activate kar diye mere to fir hum attend karne lage. Ab dekh lijiye ek do mahina aur ratio dekh lijiye. Kyunki mere paas call aata hai to main to koshish karti hu ki ghar hum isko nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai na.
Executive: Bas aap apne end se dekh lena kitni call aapke number pe miss call mein dikha raha hai IndiaMART se. Usko aap app ke through app ke through callback kar lena. Baki main ek baar sir se discuss karne ka koshish karti hu taki ye jo.
Customer: IndiaMART se hamara jo jo call jo jaata hai na call ye to mujhe to app ke through nahi ja raha. Jaise aap log matlab open kar rahe hai to direct mobile se log call kar de rahe hai. App se call jaane se maybe ho sakta hai ki shayad aapka record dikha de. Kyunki callback jaata hi hai.
Executive: Callback jo aap karte hoge na wo app ke through na jaake direct karte hoge. To direct karte ho na to yaha pe show nahi karta hume. Hum jab aap jab app se karoge na tab hume aapka callback dikhata hai ki kitne percent aapne callback kiya hai customer ko. Koi issue nahi hai. Ek baar ye aap.
Customer: Aapka feedback to main sara daal hi de rahi hu. Har call mein dekhiye aapka feedback gaya hoga matlab jo bhi call.
Executive: Nahi, wo cheez feedback hai. But aap try thoda bahut ye kiya karo na ki jo customer ki call aapki miss ho rahi hai aap usko na calls jab karte ho to direct na karke aap app ke through karo ma'am. Ye thoda sa aapke hi call ke response rate ko badhayega. Overall jo call ka response rate hota hai na wo buyer ko visible hota hai. Agar buyer IndiaMART ke platform pe jaake aapka koi product search karta hai.
Customer: Lekin main November ka main dekh rahi hu. November ki aise mujhe lagta hai. 9 se 15 ke beech mein aapka char hai. Char mein se do miss hai.
Executive: Aap month pe click kar lo na monthly pe. Waha do option aayega weekly aur monthly. Aap monthly pe click karo.
Customer: Theek hai, haan.
Executive: Jab monthly pe aap karoge to aapko overall call dikh raha hoga November ka 17.
Customer: Haan haan to haan 17 aapka November ka 17 ka aap ek din ka free to leke chal sakte hai. Kyunki miss karta hi karta hai abhi.
Executive: Haan to 17 mein se aapki chhe call miss hui hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan 17 mein se haan to wo average kar sakte hai. Kyunki hota aisa time hai jab aap office mein kabhi kuch nahi hota hai.
Executive: Haan haan main samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Is mahine ka main is mahine ka main nahi bol rahi. Main jo bol rahi hu na last aapka October, September.
Customer: Piche ka mera number nahi tha. Piche ka mera sir main office mein hum apna off kar dete the.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan ye problem nahi utha haan nahi utha pa rahe honge sir log call busy bhi to rehta hai na.
Executive: Haan to ye problem jo aayi thi wo.
Customer: Ye kya hota hai?
Customer: Ab sahi hai. Ab to November mein ab to hai November mein sahi hai. Haan. Abhi hota kya hai na ma'am ki dekho call jab zyada miss ho jaati hai na to aapki visibility hamper karti hai IndiaMART pe. Wo call response rate kam jayega to aapki listing bhi IndiaMART se down hoti jaati hai. To thoda sa na ek baar koi nahi ispe hum work on karte hai. Baki sir ko ek baar hum call kar lenge.
Customer: Italian ke liye. Ek baar sir ka product ke liye aap kar lijiye na.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am. Plywood ka rakhna hai ki nahi rakhna hai. Actually wo kya hai na main aapko batati hu. Plywood ka agar hum lead purchase hi karte hai to yaha pe kya funda hai ki plywood jitne bhi shopkeeper hote hai ya agar matlab Patna se chhod kar ke dusre state se koi dusre district se koi le na lead lega transportation mein pain zyada ho jaata hai. Aur hum log isi wajah se wo mere liye matlab beneficial nahi tha. Fir bhi agar sir choose karne lage sir bolte hai interstate ke liye to main plywood ke liye fir unse baat karungi.
Executive: Aur automatic sliding door, automatic sliding door ka kya hai ma'am? Isme aap karte ho?
Customer: Usme haan usme main karti hu.
Executive: To iski bhi buylead aapne na.
Customer: Glass ka.
Executive: Haan. Iski bhi ek buylead aapko purchase karni padegi. Kyunki last 30 days se isme bhi aapne koi lead nahi purchase kiya hai. Automatic sliding door mein.
Customer: Sara product ka dekhte hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai ma'am, main dekh leti hu. Bas iske lead aap purchase karna hai isliye.
Customer: Nahi sara main nahi, main aapko batati hu. Sara nahi aapka main jo star.
Executive: Kaun kaun sa product main aapko bata deti hu. Main bata rahi hu jo aapki star service hai na star service aapki chhe category mein opted hai. Pehla hai aapka UPVC sliding window, theek hai?
Customer: Iska to hum har din purchase karte hai.
Executive: Haan isme aapka hai. Main main wahi bata rahi hu. Isme aapka hai. Dusra hai aapka polycarbonate roofing sheet. Isme bhi aap purchase kar rahe ho, theek hai?
Customer: Haan isme bhi hai.
Executive: Haan haan isme bhi purchase hai. Teesra, teesra hai aapka UPVC sliding door. Isme bhi aap consume kar rahe ho, theek hai? Chautha aapka hai tuffin glass. Tuffin mein bhi aap purchase kar rahe ho. Paanchwa hai LED mirror. LED mirror mein ek mahine se koi lead nahi purchase hua. Ye aap note kar lena ma'am, theek hai? Ye aap note kar lo.
Customer: LED mirror ka main dekhungi LED.
Executive: Chhata hai aapka.
Executive: Chhata hai aapka Italian marble. Isme bhi 30 dino se koi.
Customer: Haan haan wo sir dekhte hai. Italian marble ke liye aap plywood ke liye aap sir se baat karo.
Executive: Haan aur green plywood, theek hai? Haan aur ek hai automatic sliding door. Ye aap ek note kar lo, theek hai?
Customer: Aap sirf do cheez ke liye baat kar rahe hai. Green plywood.
Executive: Haan main Italian aur plywood ke liye kar lungi. Aur Italian ke liye kar lungi.
Customer: Ek aur kaun sa product bol rahe hai? Automatic sliding door bhi hai na.
Executive: Haan, ye purchase karna hai aapko. Theek hai? Sir green plywood mein deal karte ho aap?
Customer: Ab usko mat hi daaliye. Plywood ke sector ko na yaha pe mat daaliye.
Executive: Chaliye main sir se ek baar discuss kar lungi iska, theek hai? Theek hai ma'am. Theek hai, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with product updation.

- No buyleads purchased in Italian marble & green plywood.

- Incoming calls are being missed.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to discuss product updation issues.

- Executive explained the importance of buyleads.

- Executive suggested checking missed calls and using app.

- Executive will discuss plywood with concerned team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, visibility, missed calls
